de.iss.mv2.messaging

Class MV2CommunicationElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.messaging.MV2CommunicationElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageField, MV2Message

    public abstract class MV2CommunicationElement
extends java.lang.Object
    The base class for all communication elements.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer
